'''Danny''' is the fiancé of [[Gretchen (Superfreak)|Gretchen]].

==History==
Danny came into the hospital with his fiancée, Gretchen, who was having trouble breathing. When they removed a condom from her lung, Danny left because he believed that Gretchen had cheated on him. However, when he returned to get his mother's ring from her, he was informed that she had aspirated the condom while trying to put it on a banana. She wanted to be ready for their wedding night because she wanted him to enjoy it. He insisted that he'd enjoy it no matter what.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is engaged to [[Gretchen (Superfreak)|Gretchen]].
